Title: Object: Repos en Egypte
Series: Galerie Impériale de l'Ermitage
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Annibale Carracci: landscape with in the left foreground the Virgin sitting on a river bank, flanked by two adoring angels, and with Christ Child sleeping on her lap; on the right, Joseph tying the ass to a tree; circular composition. c.1845/47 Lithograph on chine collé, with tint stone
Producer name: Print made by: Jean François Victor Dollet
Curator's comments: See 1859,1008.128 for comment on series. The painting is in the Hermitage; see Posner 142.
